summary: Completed Phase 2 testing - Task Management and Handover Alerts features. All APIs and UI components working correctly. 24/25 backend tests passed (1 transient network 520 error).

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 error during test (transient network issue, not reproducible on retry)

issues: Console warning about <span> cannot be child of <option> - hydration warning in React, minor issue

action_items: Minor: Fix React hydration warning in ProjectTasks.js select element (span inside option tag)
critical_code_review_comments: Task Management API implements all 6 statuses (to_do, own_task, in_progress, delegated, completed, cancelled)
Task categories include all 7 types (general, meeting, deliverable, review, follow_up, admin, client_communication)
Handover Alerts correctly calculates 15-day deadline from agreement approval date
Timeline/Gantt view is a custom implementation (not using react-gantt-timeline library)
seed_data_creation: Created 8 test tasks with various categories and statuses for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 features fully tested. Task Management works with all CRUD operations, status changes, and Gantt view. Handover Alerts shows 2 approved agreements (AGR-2026-0001, AGR-2026-0002) both 'ON TRACK' with 15 days remaining. Project has 1 consultant (Rajiv Kumar) assigned. Projects page has Tasks and Assign Consultant buttons working.
